amendment.description: To modify reporting requirements on U.S. personnel involved in the anti-narcotics campaign in Colombia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1162 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1162 proposed by Senator Lugar to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9162-9166; text: CR S9165) To modify reporting requirements on U.S. personnel involved in the anti-narcotics campaign in Colombia.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1162 proposed by Senator Lugar to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1162 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
